mapper.select: SELECT p.PAYMENT_ID AS "paymentId", o.ORDER_ID AS "orderId", TO_CHAR(p.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "paymentDate", u.UNAME AS "uname", cc.TYPE AS "type", oh.PRICE AS "price", oh.PRICE - (oh.PRICE * 0.10) AS "netProfit" FROM payment p JOIN orders o ON p.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN users u ON o.USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN order_history oh ON o.ORDER_ID = oh.ORDER_ID JOIN common_code cc ON p.PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE = cc.CODE WHERE to_char(p.PAYMENT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY p.PAYMENT_ID DESC
